definition: "walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
that very night/through the night/for several nights in a row
midnight/in the middle of the night
day and night/period of 24 hours/continuously, without stop
night scene/the dim light of night

sentences.english: His need to implement positive change in the world around him keeps him awake at nights.
sentences.chinese: 夜深了，改良周遭世界的愿望使他夜不能眠。

sentences.english: Install a hall or night light if your child is scared of the dark.
sentences.chinese: 安装一个夜明灯，如果你的孩子怕黑的话。

sentences.english: Night is so quiet; the only unquiet is my heart missing you.
sentences.chinese: 夜很安静，无法安静的，可能就是我想你的心了。

sentences.english: We are arrant knaves all; believe none of us.
sentences.chinese: 本人们都是彻头彻尾的年夜骗子，别信本人们。

sentences.english: Especial chilly in the later fall night.
The house is three times as big as ours.
sentences.chinese: 这房子是我们房子的三倍年夜。

sentences.english: At the moment, very quiet night, the eighth floor rooftop terrace is a kiosk hospital.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，夜很静，八楼的楼顶，阳台就是一小亭院。

sentences.english: These small businesses have benefited greatly from the fall in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 小企业应利率下降而获得了很年夜的好处。

sentences.english: Contributing to the funereal atmosphere is an enforced nocturnal darkness.
sentences.chinese: 对送葬的大气有助益是被运行的夜黑暗。

sentences.english: And we spent the night at a five-star hotel in Jiangmen city.
sentences.chinese: 我们在江门市一家五星级酒店过了夜。

sentences.english: Night terrors are an inherited problem and occur in about 2% of children.
sentences.chinese: 夜惊是遗传性的，约2%的孩子会有夜惊问题。

sentences.english: Write dull eyes still staring at the dark night to close the.
sentences.chinese: 写写乏味了双眼仍旧盯着漆黑的夜不肯合上。

sentences.english: The greater part of whitewashing is done with ink.
sentences.chinese: 年夜部分的粉饰是用墨水进行的。

sentences.english: Maybe if I turn off the night-light, I can keep the sheets.
sentences.chinese: 如果我把夜明灯关了这床单还能用。

sentences.english: Lens ark and under the ark of perfect collocation, let beauty regardless of the dayside and night.
sentences.chinese: 镜柜与下柜的完美搭配，让美丽不分昼与夜。

sentences.english: I walk through the park on a sunny summer's day.
sentences.chinese: 我正正在一个阳勒姹蹦夜走过了母园。

definition: long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
late at night/in the dead of night
